questions.question: 1.Identify the mistake in the following diagram:

answers.b: b.Loop should be replaced with Alt
answers.c: c.Interfaces should not be placed in sequence diagram

questions.question: 2.Which of the following statements is true about drawing time sequence diagrams?

answers.a: a.A time sequence diagram is used to visualize the interactions between objects in a system over a period of time.
answers.b: b.A time sequence diagram is used to show the structural relationships between objects in a system.
answers.c: c.A time sequence diagram is used to illustrate the flow of control within a single object in a system.
answers.d: d.A time sequence diagram is used to document the architecture of a system.

questions.question: 3.When drawing a time sequence diagram, which of the following statements is true?

answers.a: a.The vertical axis represents the objects involved in the system, while the horizontal axis represents time.
answers.b: b.The vertical axis represents time, while the horizontal axis represents the objects involved in the system.
answers.c: c.The vertical axis represents the messages exchanged between objects, while the horizontal axis represents time.
answers.d: d.The vertical axis represents the messages exchanged between objects, while the horizontal axis represents time.
